extension.summary: Play video and audio podcasts from 4d.rtvslo.si
Predvaja arhivske video in avdio posnetke 4d.rtvslo.si
extension.description: RTV Slovenia is a national radio and television public broadcast organization. With this plugin you can watch both video and audio podcasts published on their website.
RTV Slovenija je javna državna radiotelevizijska organizacija. S tem vtičnikom si lahko ogledate vse televizijske in radijske posnetke oddaj (podcaste), ki so objavljeni na njihovi spletni strani.
extension.news: v1.0.0 (2019-01-09) - plays podcasts only, for live streams see plugin.rtvslo.live - user login that works without Requests lib - takes full advantage of the rich metadata RTVSLO provides (pictures, plots...) - listing podcasts by calendar days rather than random pages - search tool reintroduced; yes, with unicode support(čšž...) - searching for audio podcasts included

v1.0.0 (2019-01-09) - predvaja izključno arhivske posnetke, za žive oddaje glej plugin.rtvslo.live - prijava deluje neodvisno od knjižnice Requests - uporablja bogate metadata vsebin, ki jih zagotavlja RTV Slovenija (slike, sinopsisi...) - posnetki so organizirani v skupine po dnevih, namesto po naključnih straneh - ponovna implementacije iskalnika; s podporo unicode (čšž...) - iskalnik omogočen tudi za radijske arhive
